pr_title: KEYCLOAK-15184: Use static inner class where possible

timeline.message: KEYCLOAK-15184: Use static inner class where possible

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure we should be changing this code as it looks like it is taken over. WDYT @testn @hmlnarik?
timeline.author: mhajas

replies.bodyText: Taken over? Do you mean that it is the code it was adopted from other project?
replies.author: testn

replies.bodyText: Well, I am not sure. It just looks like that because the package doesn't start with org.keycloak.
replies.author: mhajas

replies.bodyText: +1, please keep this one as is
replies.author: hmlnarik

replies.bodyText: Thank you for the confirmation @hmlnarik. @testn Could you please revert changes here^^ and in federation/sssd/src/main/java/org/freedesktop/dbus/ObjectTree.java?
replies.author: mhajas
